Class OnionClient

java.lang.Object
OnionClient
public class OnionClient
extends java.lang.Object
Client Class to choose amount of nodes to connect to and talk with server

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    OnionClient​(int nrOfNodes, java.lang.String ip, int endPort)
    Constructor of OnionNode which takes in ip and port of the server it wants to connect to Creates all symmetric keys upon creation

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    byte[] encryptMessage​(byte[] msg)
    Method that is used for encryption when talking to server
    byte[] encryptSecretKey​(int nowNode, byte[] msg)
    This method encrypts the secret key we are sending the desired node with its other nodes secret key
    java.security.PublicKey firstNodeKey​(java.lang.String msg)
    method to communicate with the first node and ask for key
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    void setNodeDestinations()
    Reads in and sets all node ip and ports from a file.
    void setup()
    Setup establishes connection between client and its nodes

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • OnionClient

      public OnionClient​(int nrOfNodes, java.lang.String ip, int endPort) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor of OnionNode which takes in ip and port of the server it wants to connect to Creates all symmetric keys upon creation
      Parameters:
      nrOfNodes - number of nodes the client desires
      ip - ip of the server
      endPort - port of the server
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - When KeyGenerator throws NoSuchAlgorithmException

  • Method Details

    • setNodeDestinations

      public void setNodeDestinations() throws java.io.IOException
      Reads in and sets all node ip and ports from a file. In an ideal online solution this is fetched from a directory node, but here we considered it unecessary work to implement, as we always get different ips on the school network
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when BufferedReader throws IOException

    • setup

      public void setup() throws java.lang.Exception
      Setup establishes connection between client and its nodes
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - thrown when DataInputStream,DataOutputStream fails

    • firstNodeKey

      public java.security.PublicKey firstNodeKey​(java.lang.String msg) throws java.io.IOException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
      method to communicate with the first node and ask for key
      Parameters:
      msg - message for the node
      Returns:
      returns the public key of the first node
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown when DataInputStream,DataOutputStream fails
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when KeyFactory has failed
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - thrown when KeyFactory generation of public key fails

    • encryptSecretKey

      public byte[] encryptSecretKey​(int nowNode, byte[] msg) throws java.lang.Exception
      This method encrypts the secret key we are sending the desired node with its other nodes secret key
      Parameters:
      nowNode - node we want to give the secret key to
      msg - message (secret key) for the node
      Returns:
      byte array of the complete encrypted message to reach the desired node
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - thrown when CryptoUtil encrypting

    • encryptMessage

      public byte[] encryptMessage​(byte[] msg) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method that is used for encryption when talking to server
      Parameters:
      msg - message to encrypt, in the form of a bytearray
      Returns:
      encrypted bytearray
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when CryptoUtil.encryptAES throws an exception

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
